details: Voted to increase ACA healthcare premiums for millions of Americans.
Consistently fought for Medicare for All and expanded healthcare access.
Authored legislation to raise minimum wage to $15 per hour.
Strong advocate for clean energy and environmental protection legislation.
Supported legislation weakening antitrust enforcement against big tech companies.
Led bipartisan efforts to lower prescription drug costs.
Leading advocate for climate change action and corporate accountability.
Supported a funding deal without ACA subsidy protections, causing significant healthcare premium increases for millions of Americans.
Voted against all measures in recent years to block arms sales to the Israeli government while they were actively commiting genocide against Palestinians.
Endorsed by and funded by AIPAC, an organization that opposes efforts to hold the Israeli government accountable for acts of genocide committed against Palestinians.
